headline: VARIAN DIFFUSION PUMP
keywords: diffusion vacuum pumps diff pumps  diff pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Diffusion Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Varian
Model M6
Inlet Flange ASA 203.2 mm (8.000 in)
Foreline Flange Other 38.1 mm (1.500 in)
Pumping Speed Helium 1,800.00 l/s (3,814.37 CFM)
Pumping Speed Air 1,500.00 l/s (3,178.64 CFM)
Ultimate Pressure 5.00E-8(En) torr (6.67E-8 mbar)
Warmup Time 12 Minutes
Cooldown Time 20 Minutes
Fluid Charge 0.40 L (0.11 gal, 0.09 Br gal)
Cooling Water Required Minimum Flow: 0.20 GPM (0.76 l/m) Minimum Temperature: 16 ºC (61 ºF, 289.00 ºK) Maximum Temperature: 27 ºC (81 ºF, 300 ºK)
Water Connection 1/8" NPT
Other Information OD: 11"
ID: 7.88"
Bolt circle: 9.5" X 8 bolts
O Ring groove: 8.25"(Parker 2-267)
Foreline Flange: Straight Pipe 1.5" I.D.
Power Requirements 208 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 16.000 in (40.6 cm)
Height 18.750 in (47.6 cm)
Weight 36 lb (16 kg)
